name: Yellow Plane HD
description:
****** USER REVIEWS **********

"This is one of the best nostalgia games ever"
"Simple game and so fun to play"

************************************
Features !!!!
************************************

-Gyroscope: Use the movement of your device to guide the plane left or right.

-Unlimited bullets!! Shoot helicopters, airplanes, jets and boats all along the river!

- 40 worlds.

- Fuel up whenever you can to keep your enemies at bay.

-Play against friends and other players from around the globe.


-Use the movement of your iPad or iPhone to guide the plane left or right and take out those enemy ships.
